content:
The BLIP Protocol

  • Multiple access modes

    • ALIVE
      • Fast - maintains connection
      • Expensive - maintains connection
    • AWARE
      • Slower - create TCP connection
      • Scalable - only use needed connections
    • Other modes?
      • Multicast -- Reliable Multicast very delicate
        • RFC 2357
